      • isPrivilegedPort

        public static boolean isPrivilegedPort(int port)
        Only effects Unix-like OS'es (Linux and Mac OS X) It's possible to give non-root users access to privileged ports but it's very complicated for java and a technically a security risk if malicious code was ran but it would be in our interest to find a way to detect such workaround
        Parameters:
        port - The port run we would like to check
        Returns:
        True if the port is under 1024 and we are not running on the root account
